panels.description: WARNING if any subsystem is defined with open/no security
panels.title: Subsystem Security

panels.description: The sum of capacity from all namespaces defined to subsystems
panels.title: Capacity Exported

panels.description: Shows the highest average CPU on a gateway within the gateway group
panels.title: Busiest Gateway CPU

panels.description: Show the subsystems by the count of namespaces they present to the client
panels.title: Top 5 Subsystems by Namespace

panels.description: Shows the distribution of namespaces by ANA group. Ideally, the namespaces should be evenly distributed across ANA groups.
panels.title: Count of Namespace by ANA Group

panels.description: Even segments show clients are connected across the gateways in a uniform manner.
panels.title: Clients Connected by Gateway
AVG Reactor CPU Usage by Gateway

panels.description: Reactor thread CPU busy comes from the SPDK
panels.title: Reactor Threads CPU Usage : $gateway

panels.description: I/O latency as determined by the SPDK
panels.title: AVG I/O Latency

panels.description: Shows the busiest rbd images (namespaces) within a given subsystem

targets.expr: topk(5, (sum by(pool_name, rbd_name) (((rate(ceph_nvmeof_bdev_reads_completed_total[1m]) + rate(ceph_nvmeof_bdev_writes_completed_total[1m])) * on(instance,bdev_name) group_right ceph_nvmeof_bdev_metadata) * on(instance, bdev_name) group_left(nqn) ceph_nvmeof_subsystem_namespace_metadata{nqn="$subsystem"})))

panels.title: TOP 5 - IOPS by device for '$subsystem'

targets.expr: sum by(pool_name,rbd_name) ((rate(ceph_nvmeof_bdev_reads_completed_total[1m]) * on(instance,bdev_name) group_right ceph_nvmeof_bdev_metadata) + (rate(ceph_nvmeof_bdev_writes_completed_total[1m]) * on(instance,bdev_name) group_right ceph_nvmeof_bdev_metadata))

sum by(pool_name,rbd_name) ((rate(ceph_nvmeof_bdev_read_bytes_total[1m]) * on(instance,bdev_name) group_right ceph_nvmeof_bdev_metadata) + (rate(ceph_nvmeof_bdev_written_bytes_total[1m]) * on(instance,bdev_name) group_right ceph_nvmeof_bdev_metadata))

panels.description: Shows the rbd images (namespaces) with the highest throughput in a given subsystem

targets.expr: topk(5, (sum by(pool_name, rbd_name) (((rate(ceph_nvmeof_bdev_read_bytes_total[1m]) + rate(ceph_nvmeof_bdev_written_bytes_total[1m])) * on(instance,bdev_name) group_right ceph_nvmeof_bdev_metadata) * on(instance, bdev_name) group_left(nqn) ceph_nvmeof_subsystem_namespace_metadata{nqn="$subsystem"})))

panels.title: TOP 5 - Throughput by device for '$subsystem'
